an1.198:1.1: “The foremost of my monk disciples in creating a mind-made body is Cūḷapanthaka.
an1.199:1.1: … who are skilled in the evolution of consciousness is Cūḷapanthaka.
an1.200:1.1: … who are skilled in the evolution of perception is Mahāpanthaka.
an1.201:1.1: … who live without conflict is Subhūti.
an1.202:1.1: … who are worthy of a religious donation is Subhūti.
an1.203:1.1: … who stay in the wilderness is Revata of the Acacia Wood.
an1.205:1.1: … who are energetic is Soṇa Koḷivisa.
an1.206:1.1: … who are good speakers is Soṇa Kuṭikaṇṇa.
an1.207:1.1: … who receive many possessions is Sīvali.
an1.208:1.1: … who are strong in faith is Vakkalī.”
